thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Australia shares to open higher; NZ inches up

title: Australia shares to open higher; NZ inches up
text: February 7, 2018 / 9:16 PM / in 15 minutes Australia shares to open higher; NZ inches up Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 8 (Reuters) - Australian shares are set to open slightly higher on Thursday, extending their recovery into a second session as investors grappled with a global exodus from equities. The local share price index futures rose 28 points to 5,818.0, a 58.8-point discount to the underlying S&P/ASX 200 index close. The benchmark rose 0.8 percent on Wednesday. New Zealand's benchmark S&P/NZX 50 index rose slightly in early trade. (Reporting by Ambar Warrick in Bengaluru; Editing by Toby Chopra)
